response.overview: True Prince captures the magnetic personality of this consummate dancer in that rarified atmosphere that surrounds an artist devoted to his art. The film chronicles the rituals of a dancer's daily life - the rehearsals, the fans, the backstage milieu, and the strenuous performance demands of an international star. Through it all, Malakhov remains a modern man with an old-fashioned virtue - complete dedication to his art.
response.title: True Prince: Vladimir Malakhov
